resources.string: Start adding logins to your Dashlane vault.
One secure place for all your important info
Add anything from logins to payments—and so much more!
Store important notes here—like WiFi passwords and access codes.
When you store personal details here, Dashlane can fill forms for you.
Store your IDs (driver’s license, passport, etc.) in this secure space.
Protect infrastructure secrets like API keys and encryption codes here, and retrieve them securely using our command-line interface (CLI) capabilities.
Breeze through online checkouts, securely. Add the cards you use most often here.
